status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"23rd9","text":"To purify mCherry-ATG13/101 HORMA dimer, we express mCherry-tagged ATG13 (1-191aa) from a pCAG backbone (available from Addgene) together with GST-TEV-ATG101 (available from Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lnfp","text":"Express the ATG13/101 HORMA dimer in FreeStyleTM HEK293F cells, grow at   in FreeStyle™ 293 Expression Medium (Thermo, 12338-026). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8h8lb","text":"The day before transfection, seed the cells at a density of 0.7 x 10^6 cells per ml. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"diuef","text":"On the day of transfection, transfect a   culture with   of plasmid at a molar 1:1 ratio, dilute in   of Opti-MEMR I Reduced Serum Medium (Thermo, 31985-062), and  Polyethylenimine (PEI 25K, Polysciences CatNo 23966-1), also dilute in 13 ml of Opti-MEM media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":100,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":163,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"13","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"800","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5pgdg","text":"One day post transfection, supplement the culture with   EXCELL R 293 Serum-Free Medium (Sigma-Aldrich, 14571C- 1000ML). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
